text: Xinshimen a! Nimen dang [wei an la zhi dao] shiyong nimen [hefa] zhuan lai de jiamei zhi wu [zhu 1] he wo wei nimen cong da dishang shengchan chulai de wanwu, nimen bie xuan bu hao de, lian nimen dou yao bi shang yanjing cai yuanyi jieshou de dongxi zuowei nimen de shishe wu [zhu 2]. Nimen dang zhi dao, an la que shi wu suo qiu de, shou zansong de.
